1028.question: How is the quality of singing voice measured?
1028.response: {'Answer': 'The quality of the singing voice is measured by the metrics, such as Naturalness and Similarity. These metrics are obtained through Mean Opinion Score (MOS), which is a subjective assessment of the audio quality. It is also measured using the NCC score, which is an objective measure of the similarity between the original and converted audio.'}
1028.answer:
Automatic: Normalized cross correlation (NCC)
Manual: Mean Opinion Score (MOS)
